description: This file defines a 'Button' component using LightningJS framework, with templating and state management for a toggle button.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML template of the Button component with conditional text based on internal state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initial state of the component, managing 'isFavorited' and display texts.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Input handler for the 'enter' event, toggling the 'isFavorited' state.
